sameStationMsg: 'Departure Station' and 'Arrival Station' cannot be the same.
datetimeNotAllowMsg: 'Departure Time' can only be selected within today and the next two months.
noTrainDataTitleMsg: No train information found! There are two possible scenarios:
noTrainInThisTimeMsg: The departure time set is too late and there are no more scheduled trips.
noTrainStopBetweenStationsMsg: There are no trains stopping between these two stations.
noTrainDataDueToApiErrorMsg: System anomaly, please try again later or notify the system administrator.
trDisclaimerMsg: The information provided on this site is for reference only. Please refer to the actual railway conditions or information published by the official Taiwan Railways Administration for accuracy.
thsrDisclaimerMsg: The information provided on this site is for reference only. Please refer to the actual railway conditions or information published by the official Taiwan High Speed Railways Administration for accuracy.
